data.claim: Cinematch: Creative professional networking platform for film/music industry. Next.js 16 + Supabase + Tailwind CSS 4 + design token system. User roles: composer, director, producer, music_supervisor, sound_designer, filmmaker. Subscription tiers: Free (£0), Pro (£9.99/mo), Studio (£29.99/mo). Has AI-powered Visual QA system for UI analysis. Port 3003.
